scripts.report1: npx newman run https://www.getpostman.com/collections/c9cb28cffa61d7984677 -d dataset/satellitePositionDataSet.json --suppress-exit-code 1 -r --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/reportISSSatellitePosAPI.html htmlextra
